sentence.Network_en: There has been an overall growth in population, despite some draconian efforts to contain it.

sentence.Network_en: Let us keep at our efforts to abolish the draconian ISA.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我们继续斗争以废除残酷的内安法令.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from the Greek name Drakōn (see Draco) + -ian

entry.def: Draconian laws or measures are extremely harsh and severe.

example.ex: ...draconian measures to lower US healthcare costs.
example.tran: 削减美国医疗保健费用的严厉措施

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Draco or his harsh code of laws;
